name: SPACEBUS (itch) (Edgejuice)
description:
! THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT! EVERYTHING YOU SEE CAN CHANGE !

By Edgejuice (Including art, music, programming and some sound effects)

BUILD 1.5 (Prologue & Polishing)

SPACEBUS is an RPG made with RPG Maker 2003 where you connect to a robot to infiltrate a ship called... well, SPACEBUS! Things... don't go as planned, though.

There's a secret boss lying around. Can you find him?

 Follow @EruditoZz on twitter for news!

Game Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/edge_stash/sets/spacebus-ost?si=e71c59780d624c929e5831ea0...
